articles.author: Maura Judkis, Ashley Fetters Maloy
articles.title: American Girl dolls are turning 40, just like the millennials who loved them - The Washington Post
articles.description: Kirsten, Samantha and Molly are entering midlife. How have they aged? But really — how have we?
articles.content:
NEW YORK The American Girls are turning 40, but when you look at them, youd never know it. They are forever 10, schoolgirls with hair bows and a semi-smile that reveals two front teeth.
You know who… [+73 chars]
